body:
Well that was weird. I had to use the `--no-verify` flag when committing to get around Therapist having issue finding the git merge files:

`fatal: could not open '.git/MERGE_HEAD' for reading: No such file or directory`

I thought I was going crazy for a second. Thanks @mythmon !
